text:
DeepMacro | New York City | Devops, Data Science | Full-Time | ONSITE | https://angel.co/deepmacro-1/jobs

DeepMacro provides early, independent assessment of economic conditions across the developed and emerging world, using information gathered from novel Internet sources. Our clients include some of the world's most recognizable hedge funds and asset managers.

If you are a detail-oriented Python developer, comfortable supporting production applications in the AWS environment, and curious about the interaction of macroeconomics and financial markets, we'd love to meet you.

Contact: URL above, or drop us a line: jobs at deepmacro.com
